keyword.name: for
keyword.text: For loop iterates through anything that provides an iterator. The syntax is as follows: for (item in collection) print(item) More info

keyword.name: namespace
keyword.text: A source file may start with a header namespace declaration (see the grammar): namespace foo.bar // ... More info

keyword.name: object
keyword.text:
Sometimes we need to create an object of a slight modification of some class, without explicitly declaring a new subclass for it. Java handles this case with anonymous inner classes. Kotlin slightly generalizes this concept with object expressions and object declarations.
More info
